channel.title: More Progress! im learning alot
channel.description:
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/1acdf6ce3b44cde13361cab61c6227ed.gif[/img]
- orbiting using 'a' and 's' keys. - movement using arrow keys. - not very noticeable but player height changes as he moves across the heightmap. - walk animation starts when hitting the arrow keys, stand animation starts if not hitting the arrow keys.
simple but better then it was.

item.title: More Progress! im learning alot
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Good work. Glad to see you’re getting the hang of it.

Read full topic

  • orbiting using ‘a’ and ‘s’ keys.
  • movement using arrow keys.
  • not very noticeable but player height changes as he moves across the heightmap.
  • walk animation starts when hitting the arrow keys, stand animation starts if not hitting the arrow keys.
